DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate the role of purging the hematopoietic cell graft on outcomes for non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma.
DOC.brief_title: Enrichment & Purging of Stem Cells in Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma
DOC.detailed_description: To study the use of peripheral blood stem cells which have been treated in an effort to remove tumor cells. The researchers hope to learn whether or not this will be more effective in removing the tumor cells as compared to other methods of purging (the removal of cancer cells).
